title: compute01 Maintenance
content:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we regularly carry out maintenance work on our systems.

The maintenance work will take place on Friday, 28.01.2022 at 09:00 (CET) and will last up to one hour.

During this time, cloud servers on compute01 will be unavailable. During the maintenance window, we will shut down the cloud servers via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding

2022-01-28T08:55:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed. All cloud servers are online again.
